text: le’ineziyami met’ifo sirani beseru weyimi nefisochachewini bebedelu gize alahini yemiyasitawisuna lehat’i’atochachewi mihiretini yemileminu lehonuti ke’alahimi lela hat’i’atochini yemimiri anidimi yele፡፡ (besihiteti) beserutimi layi inerisu yemiyawik’u sihonu yemayizewetiru lehonuti (tedegisalechi)፡፡
